thread.title: Now Available: Metabolic Nutritions All-New Muscular Endurance Supplement P.S.P. Pre-Workout

author: cbs8
title: Now Available: Metabolic Nutritions All-New Muscular Endurance Supplement P.S.P. Pre-Workout
text:
Metabolic Nutrition, a top health and fitness supplement provider, is pleased to announce its latest pre-workout supplement P.S.P., which is now available for purchase online and in select retail stores including Vitamin Shoppe.
Tamarac, FL (PRWEB) October 02, 2015
Metabolic Nutrition , a national leader in the health supplement industry, today announced the highly-anticipated release of its newest product, a powerful pre-workout supplement named P.S.P. (Physique Stimulating Pre-workout). Now available online and at select retail partners including Vitamin Shoppe’s nationwide locations, P.S.P. greatly benefits the workout programs of both serious athletes and everyday fitness enthusiasts by multiplying muscular endurance, boosting mental clarity, increasing strength and improving muscular appearance.
Metabolic Nutrition received a rave response to the product’s soft-launch at the recent Mr. Olympia 2015, with many sampling consumers forecasting it becoming a top-ranked class-leader in the pre-workout category. What makes P.S.P. pre-workout so special is the formula’s 21 active ingredients. Until now, the marketplace had never seen such a comprehensive supplement specifically for improving athletic performance.
A physician formulated and pharmaceutical grade supplement, Metabolic Nutrition’s P.S.P. mixes easily and comes in a range of delicious flavors that go great with water or any beverage without the chemical aftertaste of many other supplements. Flavors include blue raspberry, fruit punch, green apple and watermelon.
“We are thrilled to announce the release of P.S.P., which is poised to quickly become a pre-workout staple in the fitness industry for those who maintain the highest standards of nutrition and workout regimens,” said Metabolic Nutrition CEO Jay Cohen. “This excellent and effective product will further enable health-conscious consumers to maximize their experiences during workouts and amplify the results achieved.”
Nationally respected for its outstanding customer service and top-quality products, Metabolic Nutrition continuously strives to improve the standards within the nutritional supplement industry. These principles are apparent not only within Metabolic Nutrition’s superior products and daily business practices, but are also reflected in the company’s unwavering philanthropic contributions to various community initiatives and charitable organizations.
For the latest on P.S.P.’s availability online and at select retailers, and other Metabolic Nutrition updates, follow the company on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram .
About Metabolic Nutrition
Metabolic Nutrition’s commitment to manufacturing and delivering superior quality, uncompromising results, great taste and high-quality supplements has made it an industry innovator in sports nutrition. For more than 25 years, Metabolic Nutrition has continued to provide top athletes as well as health-minded consumers with the quality and results they demand. For more information, please call 1-888-626-1022 or visit metabolicnutrition.com or facebook.com/metabolicnutrition
